A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Walking out of the cinema\, I initially didn't think this movie too bad\, I mean it had a few good scenes and was set in space. However\, it didn't take long for me to realise how very bad this film was. It's all good and well making a film in space\, but if you're going to exist within the Star Wars universe\, then it needs to be consistent with past films. This film gladly discards all of that\, and though it may (at best) provide for a cheap laugh\, it carries no weight. This film has no substance. This film will suffer a worst fate than the prequels.
